name: GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom
name_original: GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom
description: GuyzGamez A Nightmare on GuyGamez Street: The Cursed Forest of Doom is a 2D action-adventure game that challenges you to survive in randomly generated worlds full of enemies and items. You can collect keys from defeated foes and use them at the shop to upgrade your items and stats. Each level has a portal that leads you to a new world with different enemies, items, and terrain. How far can you go in this endless journey of exploration and combat?
